turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Canvention.
turn.2: Canvention  Canvention is the Canadian national science fiction convention, where the Prix Aurora Awards are presented.
turn.4: Normally it is held as part of an existing convention.
turn.5: When was the last time it was held?
turn.6: The list of past Canventions may be referenced in the Programme Books of the hosting conventions Clint Budd is now the current Chair of the CSFFA (elected May 2015). Prior to that, Cliff Samuels was the most recent administrator of the Prix Aurora Awards (retired in 2015).
turn.7: Who was the administrator before Samuels?
turn.9: Who was the administrator before Budd?
turn.10: Dennis Mullin was administrator for many years before that.
turn.12: The original award creators were John Bell and Sheldon Goldman.
